messages.subject: Fw: Re: moving, need help
messages.msgSnippet: Here s the info on NC.  Hope it helps.  Oh, Sarah s e-addy is puddles@mindspring.com Lynda ... Lynda, This person moving to NC should contact Lisa Carpenter at
messages.messageBody:
Here's the info on NC. Hope it helps. Oh, Sarah's e-addy is
puddles@...

Lynda

----------
>
Lynda,
This person moving to NC should contact Lisa Carpenter at
jaydsee@....
She's in Gastonia and VERY close to the places mentioned. Also, she should
join NCSecularNetwork@egroups.com, owned by Diana (Diana1422@...) and
ask to get on her list. Diana's is mostly an informative list rather than a
chatty one but she could make connnections to people in her locale via
Diana's list. Also, Diana's organized a zoo trip to Asheboro on 9-29-00,
10:30 at the North American Entrance. Call the zoo to make your free
homeschool reservations and meet us there. Nobody knows anybody...(except a
few)... it's a group composed of people on the NCSecular list.
Anyhow.... Lisa is her best bet at making an unschooling connection in that
part of the state. I'm too far away from her to get together very often :(.
Don't let your friend get confused about Lisa... she owns the NCLoop list,
which has IMHO been taken over by mostly fundies :( but Lisa is NOT like
that (a fundie, that is). I can't explain why she puts up with all that
stuff except to say she's very open and inclusive :-).
Good luck to your friend. She can contact me anytime she'd like for info.
Pass my address onto her....
Sarah
